img_summary: The image depicts the **Trailblazer’s Scarlet Gourd**, a rare item from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. This gourd has a default of 5 uses per life and provides a special effect where the first sip restores full health when the gourd is full. It is a Deluxe Edition exclusive item, obtainable at the Forest of Wolves - Front Hills Shrine in Black Wind Mountain, or alternatively at Thunderclap Temple in The New West if the Deluxe Edition is not owned.
